name: Villa Branca Jacinta

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Stayed here for 2 nights in June 2010.
reviews.title: Wonderful host & lovely breakfast

description: Villa Branca Jacinta was built at the end of the 19th century. It is surrounded by an incredible verdant garden, guarded by a majestic centenary cedar.Here, you will find an ancient house with its own soul. All the windows, doors and staircases are living details of the 19th century.After a full restoration, Villa Branca Jacinta exudes comfort and simplicity. It appeals to a romantic and mystic imagination, recalling the works of Lord Byron or Eça de Queiros.You will find a beautiful place to rest after long walking days through Serra de Sintra, ancient castles and palaces or discovering the magical Quinta da Regaleira.
